current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of State to offer rewards totaling up to $5,000,000 for information on the
			 kidnapping and murder of Naftali Fraenkel, a dual United States-Israeli
			 citizen, that began on June 12, 2014.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read the first time

action-desc.#text: Read the second time and placed on the calendar
Read the second time and placed on the calendar

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall offer a reward to any individual who furnishes
			 information leading to the arrest or conviction in any country of any
			 individual for committing, conspiring or attempting to commit, or	   
			       aiding or abetting in the commission of the kidnapping and murder of
			 Naftali Fraenkel.

text.#text: In accordance with the Rewards for Justice program authorized under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 36(b) of the State
			 Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956/s:36/ss:b

text.#text: The total amount of rewards offered under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 S2579 PCS: To require the Secretary of State to offer rewards totaling up to $5,000,000 for information on the kidnapping and murder of Naftali Fraenkel, a dual United States-Israeli citizen, that began on June 12, 2014.
